DOC.brief_summary: Comparison Clomiphene citrate Tamoxifen induction ovulation woman PCOS .
DOC.brief_title: Clomiphene Citrate Versus Tamoxifen Ovulation Induction PCOs
DOC.detailed_description: Participants fulfil inclusion exclusion criterion divide two group , group contain 300 participant ; Group ( A ) : 300 participant receive Clomiphene citrate oral tablet placebo Tamoxifen oral tablet . Group ( B ) : 300 participant receive Tamoxifen oral tablet placebo Clomiphene oral tablet . Participants abnormal menstrual history receive two tablet norethisterone 5mg tab ( Steronate ® , hi pharm/Egypt ) every12 hour 5 day withdraw period start procedure . Then ; Group ( A ) : Women receive one tablet clomiphene citrate oral tablet 50 mg ( Clomid® , aventis/Egypt ) twice daily 12 hour apart ( total dose 100 mg daily ) , one tablet placebo tamoxifen oral tablet twice daily 12 hour apart 3rd day menses 5 day , one menstrual cycle . Group ( B ) : Women receive one tablet tamoxifen oral tablet 10 mg ( Tamoxifen® , amriya/Egypt ) twice daily 12 hour apart ( total dose 20 mg daily ) , one tablet placebo clomiphene citrate twice daily 12 hour apart 3rd day menses 5 day , one menstrual cycle .
DOC.criteria: Primary infertility . Body mass index ( BMI ) 25 30 Kg/m 2 . Polycystic ovary syndrome ( use ESHRE/ASRM criterion ) . Secondary infertility . Patients BMI 25 30 Kg/m 2 . Hyper hypothyroidism , hyperprolactinemia . Current previous ( within last six month ) use oral contraceptive , glucocorticoid , antiandrogens , antidiabetic antiobesity drug hormonal drug . Intention start diet specific program physical activity . Organic pelvic disease . Tubal male factor infertility . Interval earlier treatment fertility drug less 6 month . Contraindication either : Clomiphene citrate . Tamoxifen . HCG injection .
